name: Value Density
description: Value Density describes the resources that the attacker will gain control over with a single exploitation event. It has two possible values, diffuse and concentrated.

values.name: Not Defined
values.description: This metric value is not defined. See CVSS documentation for details.

values.name: Diffuse
values.description: The vulnerable system has limited resources. That is, the resources that the attacker will gain control over with a single exploitation event are relatively small.

values.name: Concentrated
values.description: The vulnerable system is rich in resources. Heuristically, such systems are often the direct responsibility of "system operators" rather than users.
